Row.Text: This seat is vacant. Fill it by expending one of the following [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People:[NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Engineer[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward Wonders.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Magistrate[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward Buildings.[ENDCOLOR]

This seat is vacant. Fill it by expending one of the following [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People:[NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Doctor [ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+20% to [ICON_JFD_PLAGUE] Plague Threshold.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Prophet [ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]-20% enemy [ICON_MISSIONARY] Conversion.[ENDCOLOR]

This seat is vacant. Fill it by expending one of the following [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People:[NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Artist/Director/Musician/Writer[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+15% [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from Theming Bonuses.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Dignitary[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+10 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Resting Rate with City-States.[ENDCOLOR]

This seat is vacant. Fill it by expending one of the following [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People:[NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Admiral[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for Naval Units.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great General[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for Land Units.[ENDCOLOR]

This seat is vacant. Fill it by expending one of the following [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People:[NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Merchant[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]-10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold Purchase costs.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_FADING_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Scientist[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_JFD_ALPHA]+5% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science when [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happy.[ENDCOLOR]

Dictatorship is a system of government in which sovereignty is held by an ideologue.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-50% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty from [ICON_JFD_LEGITIMACY] Legitimacies.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform cost increase from [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Military Junta, One-Party.

Dictatorship is a system of government in which sovereignty is held by an ideologue.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-50% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty from [ICON_JFD_LEGITIMACY] Legitimacies.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform cost increase from [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Military Junta, One-Party.
Your Government Type is a Holy Roman Empire.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Holy Roman Empires

The Holy Roman Empire is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in a collection of states.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction power.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Privilegium Maius, Privilegium Minor.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person.

The Holy Roman Empire is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in a collection of states.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction power.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Privilegium Maius, Privilegium Minor.
Your Government Type is a Monarchy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Monarchies

Monarchy is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in an individual.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty from [ICON_JFD_LEGITIMACY] Legitimacies.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Aristocratic, Parliamentary.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Dignitary.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks building the Versailles wonder.

Monarchy is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in an individual.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty from [ICON_JFD_LEGITIMACY] Legitimacies.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Aristocratic, Parliamentary.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks building the Versailles wonder.
Your Government Type is a Republic.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Republics .

Republic is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in a body of citizens.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-25% [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform cooldown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Democratic, Oligarchic.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Magistrate.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks building the Doge's Palace wonder.

Republic is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in a body of citizens.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-25% [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Reform cooldown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Democratic, Oligarchic.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks building the Doge's Palace wonder.
Your Government Type is a Shogunate.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Shogunates

The Shogunate is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in a tripartite between the Emperor, the Shogun, and the Daimyo.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: The Daimyo, The Emperor.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Admiral and General.

The Shogunate is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in a tripartite between the Emperor, the Shogun, and the Daimyo.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: The Daimyo, The Emperor.
Your Government Type is a Theocracy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Theocracies .

Theocracy is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in the divine.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot change State Religion or Secularize.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% Max [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Autocephalous, Ecumenical.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Prophet.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks building the St. Peter's Basilica wonder.

Theocracy is a system of government in which sovereignty lies in the divine.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot change State Religion or Secularize.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+20% Max [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Legislatures: Autocephalous, Ecumenical.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks building the St. Peter's Basilica wonder.

The Legislature determines how much [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty it will cost for you to adopt a [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reform. Political Reforms are similar to [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies or [ICON_ED_DECISIONS] Decisions, but often exchange bonuses for penalties. Use them to divert state resources into an aspect of your civilization that is not functioning well!

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions that have joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Left-click for more details.[ENDCOLOR]

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction correlates to one of your cities, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of their followers to your population total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Factions' specific interests, although always in Left Reforms, depend upon the city from which they originate, and this can [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]change each turn[ENDCOLOR]. Specifically, this is based upon whether or not the city generates [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]more Faith[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Culture[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gold[ENDCOLOR], or [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Science[ENDCOLOR].

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction correlates to the followers of your State Religion, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of their followers to all followers total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Factions' specific interests, although always in Right Reforms, depend upon the civilization from which they originate, and this can [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]change each turn[ENDCOLOR]. Specifically, this is based upon whether or not the civilization generates [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]more Faith[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Culture[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gold[ENDCOLOR], or [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Science[ENDCOLOR].

The old Emperor has died and a new Imperial Court has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction that has joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Left-click for more details.[ENDCOLOR]

When an [ICON_JFD_EMPEROR] Emperor dies, your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction correlates to your City-State Allies, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of their Population to all Population of City-State Allies total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Factions' specific interests depend upon the City-State from which they originate.

Favouring the Emperor, they are your only [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction. When the current [ICON_JFD_EMPEROR] Emperor dies, a new one will succeed, bringing with them different interests. This Faction will retain total power unless you switch Governments or Legislatures.

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions that have joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Left-click for more details.[ENDCOLOR]

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction correlates to your City-State Allies, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of their Population to all Population of City-State Allies total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Factions' specific interests depend upon the City-State from which they originate.

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction correlates to your City-State Friends, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of their Population to all Population of City-State Friends total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Factions' specific interests depend upon the City-State from which they originate.

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction is associated with two Yields, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of these Yields to the sum of all Yields total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_BURGHERS]Burghers:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CULTURE] Culture [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_CLERGY]Clergy:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_PEACE] Faith [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_NOBILITY]Nobility:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_FOOD] Food [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_REVOLUTIONARIES]Revolutionaries:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Excess Unhappiness.[NEWLINE]--------

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions that have joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_Result}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Left-click for more details.[ENDCOLOR]

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction may get up to two votes per city, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of these votes to the sum of all votes total[ENDCOLOR]. The first vote goes to the Faction with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]lowest combination of two Yields[ENDCOLOR]. The second vote goes to the Faction with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]highest combination of two (or more) Specialists[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_8]Conversatives:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_PEACE] Faith [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_MONK] Monks [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_SCIENTIST] Scientists.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_3]Liberals:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLD] Gold [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_ARTIST] Artists et al. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_MERCHANT] Merchants.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_2]Socialists:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_FOOD] Food [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_DOCTOR] Doctors [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_ENGINEER] Engineers.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_REVOLUTIONARIES]Revolutionaries:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Excess[ENDCOLOR] Unhappiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This Faction is not a part of the vote and their power is calculated globally.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE]When an [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ideology[ENDCOLOR] is dominant, different [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will take the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Specialist[ENDCOLOR] vote.

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction may get up to two votes per city, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of these votes to the sum of all votes total[ENDCOLOR]. The first vote goes to the Faction with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]lowest combination of two Yields[ENDCOLOR]. The second vote goes to the Faction with the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]highest combination of two (or more) Specialists[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Faction that corresponds to your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ideology[ENDCOLOR] receives a (non-proportional) [COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]+50%[ENDCOLOR] bonus to their power.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_8]Conversatives:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_PEACE] Faith [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_MONK] Monks [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_SCIENTIST] Scientists.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_3]Liberals:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLD] Gold [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_ARTIST] Artists et al. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_MERCHANT] Merchants.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_2]Socialists:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_FOOD] Food [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_DOCTOR] Doctors [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_JFD_SPECIALIST_ENGINEER] Engineers.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_REVOLUTIONARIES]Revolutionaries:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Excess[ENDCOLOR] Unhappiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This Faction is not a part of the vote and their power is calculated globally.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE]When an [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ideology[ENDCOLOR] is dominant, different [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will take the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Specialist[ENDCOLOR] vote.

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions that have joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Left-click for more details.[ENDCOLOR]

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction is associated with an aspect of Happiness and Unhappiness, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of these aspects to the sum of all Happiness + Unhappiness total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_8]Nationalists:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_1] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Global[ENDCOLOR] Happiness [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cities[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_TEAM_3]Popularists:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_1] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Local[ENDCOLOR] Happiness[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT] +[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Population[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_REVOLUTIONARIES]Revolutionaries:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Excess[ENDCOLOR] Unhappiness.[NEWLINE]--------

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions that have joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Left-click for more details.

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction is associated with a specific value, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of these values to the sum of all values total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_CITIZEN]Civic Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CAPITAL] National Wonders.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_INDUSTRIALIST]Industrialist Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_SWAP] Domestic Trade Routes.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_MERCANTILE]Mercantile Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] International Trade Routes.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_MILITARY]Military Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_WAR] (Major) Wars.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_POPULIST]Populist Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CULTURE]Open/Complete Policy Branches.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_RELIGIOUS]Religious Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RELIGION](Major) State Religion Followers.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_REVOLUTIONARIES]Revolutionaries:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Excess[ENDCOLOR] Unhappiness.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE]Once you have an [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ideology[ENDCOLOR], different [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will compose the Legislature.

When an [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Num}[ENDCOLOR] Turn(s), your [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions will be re-organized.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction is associated with a specific value, and their power in the Legislature is determined by the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]proportion of these values to the sum of all values total[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Faction that corresponds to your [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ideology[ENDCOLOR] receives a (non-proportional) [COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]+50%[ENDCOLOR] bonus to their power.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_IDEOLOGY_AUTOCRACY]Fanaticist Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_WAR] (Major) Wars.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RELIGION](Major) State Religion Followers.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_IDEOLOGY_FREEDOM]Progressive Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] International Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CULTURE]Open/Complete Policy Branches.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_IDEOLOGY_ORDER]Radicalist Faction:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_CAPITAL] National Wonders.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_SWAP] Domestic Trade Routes.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY][ICON_JFD_REVOLUTIONARIES]Revolutionaries:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Excess[ENDCOLOR] Unhappiness.[NEWLINE]--------

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Factions that have joined your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Left-click for more details.[ENDCOLOR]
As a Military Dictatorship, you have only one [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction: the Military Junta. This Faction will retain total power unless you switch Governments or Legislatures.

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction that composes your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Left-click for more details.

As a One-Party Dictatorship, there is only one [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction within your Legislature: the Assembly. This Faction is determined by the Ideology that you have chosen.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]Communist Assembly:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires [ICON_IDEOLOGY_ORDER]Order.[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]Fascist Assembly:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires [ICON_IDEOLOGY_AUTOCRACY]Autocracy[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE][COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]Libertarian Assembly:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires [ICON_IDEOLOGY_FREEDOM]Freedom.[NEWLINE]--------

A new {1_LegislatureDesc} has been formed! The [ICON_JFD_FACTION] Faction that composes your Legislature will influence your ability to pass [ICON_JFD_REFORM] Political Reforms.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Results:[ENDCOLOR]{2_VoteList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Left-click for more details.

[COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]The {1_Desc}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]--------[NEWLINE]The Burghers stand for the power of the merchant elite.
